summary: Comprehensive testing of MISRA C Analyzer completed successfully. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI fully functional with complete upload-to-download workflow tested.
passed_tests: ZIP file upload and analysis initiation
Analysis status endpoint with invalid ID (404 error)
Frontend page loading and UI elements
Analysis results display (files analyzed, violations count)
Download report functionality from status card
Download report functionality from recent analyses list
Error handling for invalid file types
UI design elements (gradient background, Inter font, backdrop styling)
Recent analyses list updates after new analysis
Multiple file analysis (3 files, 3 violations detected)
